main.name: David Mwangi Wanjiru
main.bio: I'm a Frontend Software Developer proficient in ReactJS, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS. With expertise in JavaScript and Node.js, I craft seamless web experiences and responsive designs. Skilled in Git and Python, I prioritize software quality and efficient workflows. Passionate about bug tracking and resolution, I'm committed to excellence in software development. Currently I'm The Frontend Developer and Technical Lead @MMUSTihub, I'm dedicated to continuous learning and innovation.

education.school: Masinde Murilo University Of Science And Technology
education.description: Currently Am On My Final Year

work.title: Frontend Developer && Technical Lead
work.description:
• Led front-end development projects to enhance user experience and implement UI/UX improvements across web and mobile platforms, using React, React Native, and Next.js.
  • Conducted quality assurance testing by creating detailed test cases in Postman and ThunderClient, tracking issues to ensure high functionality and usability.
  • Developed and collaborated on key projects including:
    • Fololimo: A mobile app for farmers, integrating AI/ML and IoT technologies to provide real-time climate data and farming insights.
    • MMUSTJOSA: A journalism team news web app, delivering a responsive, user-friendly interface and cross-browser compatibility.
    • OPPS: An online proposal system for streamlined submissions and reviews.
    • InnerGlow: A mental health and awareness platform supporting accessibility and user-centric features.
  • Improved responsiveness and accessibility by implementing front-end optimizations using React, Tailwind CSS, and Next.js, delivering high-quality, SEO-friendly interfaces.
  • Collaborated closely with product and design teams to ensure designs aligned with accessibility and responsive design standards.

work.title: Software Engineering Trainee
work.description:
• Developed and tested web applications using JavaScript, React, and Tailwind CSS, focusing on seamless user interfaces and performance optimization.
  • Gained hands-on experience with version control, collaborating on GitHub, and enhancing teamwork skills.

testimonials.text: David is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
